## MatrixBuilder.diagonal() method

Constructs a square diagonal matrix whose diagonal entries come from `diagonalEntries`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
diagonal(diagonalEntries: V): M;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  diagonalEntries | <code>V</code> | A vector whose entries will be used as the diagonal entries of the new matrix |

<b>Returns:</b>

`M`

The new matrix

## Example


```
const diagonalEntries = NumberVector.fromValues(1, 2, 3);
matrixBuilder.diagonal(diagonalEntries);

// [ 1 0 0 ]
// [ 0 2 0 ]
// [ 0 0 3 ]

```
